This document will show how to tidy data. 

## Pivot longer 

```{r}
pulse_df = 
  read_sas("data/public_pulse_Data.sas7bdat") |> 
  janitor::clean_names() |> 
  pivot_longer(
    cols = bdi_score_bl: bdi_score_12m,
    names_to = "visit",
    values_to = "bdi_score",
    names_prefix = "bdi_score_"
  ) |> 
  mutate(visit = replace(visit, visit == "bl", "00m")) |> 
  relocate(id, visit)

```
